    		Request Information
    	Learn more about Chico State's undergraduate programs, life on campus, important deadlines and much more by joining our mailing list.Fields marked with an * are required.

 First NameAlso known as given name.Last NameAlso known as family name.EmailConfirm EmailMobile PhoneU.S. numbers onlyBirthdateI will need an international student Visa (F-1 or J-1) to study at Chico StatePlease select...NoYesI want to start classes in...Please select...Spring 2023 - (January)Fall 2023 - (August)Spring 2024 - (January)Fall 2024 - (August)Spring 2025 - (January)Fall 2025 - (August)Spring 2026 - (January)Fall 2026 - (August)I currently attend...  If your school is not listed, select "Unknown School." If you're not currently in school, skip this question.Need help with this form? Call 1-800-542-4426 or email info@csuchico.edu We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
